items.sentence: What Tom said to Mary was not completely true.
What are some things you are passionate about?
What are you taking all those things home for?
Are there good places to go dancing near here?
Don\'t you think your money is safe in a bank?
Don\'t you want to know who donated the money?
Tom doesn\'t particularly want to go swimming.
Do you happen to know when Tom is coming back?
How can we believe anything Tom is telling us?
It seems like you\'ve gotten better at French.
I always thought that Tom was a bit different.
I could never sing a song like that in public.
I could stay a while longer if you want me to.
Tom is married with a three-year-old daughter.
Haven\'t you asked Tom why he didn\'t do that?
Tom seems to be in more pain than anyone else.
I can\'t seem to understand anything Tom says.
Tom began to suspect that something was wrong.
Tom didn\'t know that it was Mary\'s birthday.
Have you ever been arrested for drunk driving?
